name: appealingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is attractive or interesting: Her voice has an appealingly husky quality. The design of the car is appealingly distinctive.
in a way that shows you want someone to help or protect you: She looked appealingly at the doctor. The children asked appealingly if it was time to go home yet. See
appealing
More examplesFewer examplesThe paintings are appealingly simple and direct.His essay is appealingly idiosyncratic.We stopped for lunch at an appealingly old-fashioned restaurant.The tired little boy glanced appealingly at his mother and she picked him up and carried him up the stairs.
